main event: Two irregular objects were detected on ground radar and visually observed southwest of Stuttgart, Germany, on January 3, 1961.
interesting points: The objects were faster than anything the witness had ever seen., The radar first picked up a round-shaped object that appeared and then disappeared., Another object reached a zenith before diving out of radar range., The sighting lasted for approximately three minutes., Objects exhibited unusual capabilities in movements, color, and size.
sighted object: two small and two large luminous objects
